thread.title: IN PICTURES: New MLS jerseys for the 2017 season
thread.title_full: IN PICTURES: New MLS jerseys for the 2017 season

title: IN PICTURES: New MLS jerseys for the 2017 season
text:
0 Feb 12, 2017 4:39:14 PM As the 2017 MLS campaign draws near, clubs across the league are introducing new kits for the upcoming season. 
The 2017 MLS campaign is right around the corner, and with a new season comes new clubs, new players and, of course, new uniforms. 
Clubs across the league, from expansion side Atlanta United to MLS stalwarts D.C. United and the LA Galaxy, have introduced fresh jerseys for the 2017 season, which kicks off March 3. 
Here is our rundown of the uniforms unveiled so far ... 
NEW ENGLAND REVOLUTION (AWAY)
